data.text: @poklong23 Hi, Atty. Peter. Yes, school ID signed by Principal may be accepted for domestic flights. Thank you.

We'll assist you further on your baggage concern, kindly check our DM for us to proceed. Thank you.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text:

urls.title: Carry-on baggage
urls.description: Each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage with a maximum total dimension of 56cm x 36cm x 23cm (22in x 14in x 9in) and maximum weight of 7 kgs. (15 lbs). In addition to the free carry-on baggage allowance, a passenger is allowed to carry on-board a maximum of two (2) of any the following items: a small handbag pocket book or purse an overcoat, wrap or blanket a small camera or binoculars laptop with case a reasonable amount of reading material duty free bag infant's food for consumption in
